name: Crash Racing Master 3D
description:
Welcome to a really captivating game Crash Racing Master 3D. Become a master of crash test by doing various tasks: drive, fly, fall down, explode and damage your dummy!

Perform amazing motorbike stunts.
-Discover many exciting tasks and get all the achievements in the breathtaking crash test!
-Amazing motorbike stunts - unforgettable test drive
-Breathtaking crash test: drive, fly, fall down, explode and damage your dummy!
-Different tasks and challenges of high speed and various distance
-Beat your own crash test records and become a champion

High speed and various distance challenges are waiting for you!
